sentences.sContent: The slightest movement will defocus the microscope.
sentences.sContent_eng: The slightest movement will defocus the microscope.
sentences.sCn: 最轻微的运动都会使显微镜散焦。

sentences.sContent: The microscope magnified the object two hundred times.
sentences.sContent_eng: The microscope magnified the object two hundred times.
sentences.sCn: 这架显微镜把实物放大了200倍。

sentences.sContent: The microscope capacitates small objects to be observed.
sentences.sContent_eng: The microscope capacitates small objects to be observed.
sentences.sCn: 显微镜可以观察到微小的物体。

phrases.pCn: 偏光显微镜；偏振显微镜
扫描式隧道显微镜；扫描穿隧显微镜
偏光显微镜，极化显微镜
相差显微镜；相衬显微镜
显微镜载片；显微镜载物片

remMethod.val: micro(微)+scope(看)→用来看微小的东西→显微镜

words.tran: 微观的；用显微镜可见的

trans.tranOther: a scientific instrument that makes extremely small things look larger
